user.desc: Dynamic Software Engineer with 1+ year of open-source experience, passionate about community-driven development. Skilled in Python, SQL, HTML & CSS, with strong debugging, testing, and integration abilities. Proven track record of building efficient, user-focused solutions and improving software functionality. Eager to contribute to a collaborative team while growing expertise in modern technologies.

education.desc: 10th passed (2019) from W.B.B.S.E board, 12th passed (2021) from W.B.C.H.S.E board
B.Tech. Computer Science and Engineering (2021 - Present)

experience.title: Software Development Intern
experience.description: Developed an Inventory Management System for RapidXcel Logistics using Flask, Python, and SQLAlchemy, streamlining order processing, shipment tracking, and reporting. Implemented role-based authentication, real-time inventory tracking, and analytics dashboards, enhancing logistics efficiency.

experience.title: Open Source Contributor
experience.description: Developed integrations tailored to community and customer needs. Fixed 30+ bugs in the MindsDB core and tested 40+ integrations through manual and automated testing. Built app integrations (Strapi, Intercom, Instatus), data source integrations (Denodo), and AI integrations (Deepseek model).

experience.title: Future Ready Talent Internship
experience.description: Gained expertise in Microsoft Azure services and developed cloud-based solutions using Azure. Created PortfoliAI, a chatbot specifically trained for my portfolio website.
